Facebook Status for WordPress

Ok here’s the idea: For those of you who don’t know, Facebook is a social platform with a huge number of users. In fact, many of the people I know have Facebook accounts… so clearly, tying the social network of Facebook into the blogs of the users would be kind of cool. Facebook provides an API that allows for access to a good bit of data in their network, so all one needs to do is tie this into a WordPress plugin so that we can then call forth data using nice easy template tags (or something of the sort).

Since we must crawl before we can walk, I think it should be simple enough to pull out your Facebook status and display it in your WordPress blog.

Now I just need to sit down and do this.
